<Text: The Iron Maiden Tour was a 1980 concert tour by Iron Maiden in support of their eponymous debut album.>

Triplets:<The Iron Maiden Tour
2:
--------------------
Text: Iron Maiden Tour:  The tour commenced with a British leg from 1 April to 23 August, although this included one concert in Finland, before the band supported Kiss on their Unmasked Tour from 24 August to 16 October, immediately following which guitarist Dennis Stratton was sacked and replaced with Adrian Smith.
